title: Databricks AI-Enhanced US Equity Intelligence
description: Premium equity research dataset providing comprehensive fundamental analysis for over 6,000 US publicly traded companies, enhanced with Databricks' proprietary AI analytics. Features point-in-time and restated historical financials including detailed income statements, balance sheets, cash flow statements, and ratios spanning 30+ years. Real-time pricing data with millisecond precision from all major US exchanges including NASDAQ, NYSE, and AMEX. Includes corporate actions, dividend history, split-adjusted pricing, and institutional-grade analytics for quantitative research, portfolio construction, and risk management.

title: Databricks Global Equity Intelligence Hub
description: Institutional-grade equity intelligence covering over 135,000 global public companies across 80+ countries, powered by Databricks' unified analytics platform. Features standardized financials with 10+ years of history, real-time pricing from 300+ exchanges, analyst estimates and recommendations from 3,000+ contributors, and detailed ownership data tracking institutional holdings. Includes comprehensive screening tools, peer analysis, and ESG metrics integrated with fundamental data. Leverages Databricks' AI and machine learning capabilities for enhanced insights and predictive analytics.

title: Intrinio US Stock Market Data
description: Developer-friendly US equity market data API providing real-time and historical pricing for 6,000+ US stocks, ETFs, and mutual funds. Features millisecond-latency real-time feeds, comprehensive intraday data with 1-minute bars, end-of-day pricing, and Level I market data including bid/ask spreads and market depth. Includes pre-calculated technical indicators (RSI, MACD, moving averages), corporate actions, dividend adjustments, and split history. Designed for algorithmic trading, quantitative analysis, and fintech applications with flexible pricing and robust infrastructure.

title: Bloomberg Terminal Market Data
description: The gold standard in financial market data serving 325,000+ professionals globally. Comprehensive coverage of 4.5 million securities across equities, fixed income, currencies, commodities, and derivatives from 300+ exchanges and trading venues. Features real-time pricing with microsecond latency, proprietary Bloomberg analytics, research from 1,500+ contributors, and integrated news flow. Includes Bloomberg's exclusive data points like earnings estimates, credit ratings, and economic indicators. Essential for investment banking, asset management, and institutional trading with unmatched data quality and market coverage.

title: Databricks Fixed Income Analytics Platform
description: Comprehensive fixed income universe covering 50+ million bonds across government, corporate, municipal, and agency securities from 180+ countries, enhanced with Databricks' advanced analytics capabilities. Features real-time and historical pricing, yield curves for 40+ sovereigns, credit spreads, duration and convexity metrics, and analytics for over $100 trillion in outstanding debt. Includes detailed issuer information, ratings from all major agencies, and complex instrument structures. Enhanced with Databricks' machine learning models for yield prediction and risk assessment.

title: S&P Global Fixed Income Analytics
description: Comprehensive fixed income analytics platform covering 45+ million bonds and debt instruments across 200+ countries and territories. Features real-time and historical yield curves, credit spreads, duration and convexity analytics, and risk metrics for government, corporate, municipal, and structured securities. Includes S&P's proprietary credit research, ratings migration data, and default probability models. Essential for fixed income portfolio management, duration hedging, regulatory capital calculations, and institutional investment decisions with market-leading coverage and analytical depth.

title: DTCC Fixed Income Trade Repository
description: Authoritative US fixed income trade repository capturing $10+ trillion in annual trading volume across corporate bonds, agency securities, and municipal bonds. Provides comprehensive post-trade transparency with trade-by-trade data including size, price, yield, and settlement details. Features TRACE-reported transaction data, institutional block trading analytics, and market liquidity metrics. Essential for regulatory compliance, market surveillance, best execution analysis, and institutional trading strategy optimization. Trusted by regulators, dealers, and institutional investors as the definitive source for US bond market transparency.

title: Bloomberg Fixed Income Analytics
description: Analytical and risk metrics across global bond markets using Bloomberg's proprietary analytics platform.

title: ICE Options Analytics
description: Comprehensive US listed options dataset covering 500,000+ option series across equities, ETFs, and indices. Features real-time and historical pricing, complete Greeks calculations (Delta, Gamma, Theta, Vega, Rho), implied volatility surfaces, and open interest data. Includes end-of-day settlements, corporate action adjustments, and expiration details for all major US options exchanges (CBOE, ISE, NASDAQ). Essential for derivatives trading, risk management, volatility modeling, and quantitative strategy development with institutional-grade accuracy and coverage.

title: S&P Global Swap & Derivatives Data
description: Comprehensive derivatives data covering $600+ trillion global OTC and exchange-traded derivatives markets. Features interest rate swaps, credit default swaps, currency forwards, commodity derivatives, and structured products with real-time pricing and risk analytics. Includes swap curve construction, basis calculations, and cross-currency valuations across 40+ currencies. Essential for derivatives trading, hedge fund strategies, regulatory reporting (EMIR, Dodd-Frank), and institutional risk management with market-leading coverage of complex financial instruments.

title: Bloomberg Options Volatility Data
description: Premier global options analytics covering 100+ equity markets and 500+ indices worldwide. Features real-time implied volatility surfaces, historical volatility trends, complete Greeks calculations, and proprietary Bloomberg volatility models. Includes term structure analysis, volatility skew metrics, and option flow analytics for institutional trading strategies. Essential for volatility trading, options market making, structured products pricing, and sophisticated derivative strategies with Bloomberg's industry-leading coverage and analytical depth.

title: Refinitiv Eikon Derivatives Data
description: Comprehensive cross-asset derivatives platform covering equities, fixed income, FX, commodities, and credit derivatives across 200+ global exchanges. Features real-time pricing, volatility surfaces, and analytics for options, futures, swaps, and structured products. Includes Refinitiv's proprietary valuation models, risk scenario analysis, and regulatory reporting tools. Essential for multi-asset trading desks, quantitative research, and institutional derivative strategies with seamless integration across asset classes and global markets.

title: CoinGecko Cryptocurrency Market Data
description: Comprehensive cryptocurrency market data covering 13,000+ digital assets across 800+ exchanges worldwide. Features real-time pricing, historical OHLCV data, market capitalization, trading volumes, and DeFi protocol analytics. Includes developer activity metrics, social sentiment indicators, and on-chain data integration. Essential for crypto portfolio management, DeFi research, digital asset trading, and institutional cryptocurrency analysis with extensive coverage of both major and emerging digital assets.

title: Coinbase Digital Asset Market Data
description: Institutional-grade cryptocurrency market data from the largest US digital asset exchange serving 100+ million verified users. Features real-time and historical pricing, order book depth, trade-by-trade data, and volume analytics for 200+ cryptocurrencies and tokens. Includes Coinbase Pro advanced trading data, custody integration metrics, and regulatory-compliant digital asset analytics. Essential for institutional crypto trading, DeFi strategies, and digital asset portfolio management with enterprise-grade reliability and compliance.

title: Kaiko Crypto Data Feed
description: Professional-grade cryptocurrency market data aggregating tick-level data from 100+ global exchanges and 50+ DeFi protocols. Features real-time order book snapshots, trade execution data, and institutional-quality reference rates for 3,000+ digital assets. Includes cross-exchange arbitrage analytics, liquidity metrics, and DeFi yield farming data. Essential for algorithmic trading, market making, institutional crypto strategies, and DeFi protocol analysis with sub-millisecond latency and comprehensive market coverage.

title: Chainalysis Blockchain Analytics
description: Leading blockchain intelligence platform providing comprehensive transaction analysis across 80+ blockchains including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and major Layer 2 networks. Features real-time transaction monitoring, wallet clustering, sanctions screening, and criminal investigation tools. Includes AML compliance automation, DeFi protocol risk assessment, and institutional-grade blockchain forensics. Essential for crypto compliance, law enforcement investigations, financial crime prevention, and regulatory reporting with industry-leading accuracy and coverage.

title: Mastercard SpendingPulse Consumer Insights
description: Premium alternative data sourced from aggregated and anonymized Mastercard payment network transactions representing $6+ trillion in annual global spending. Provides real-time consumer spending insights across 20+ retail sectors including automotive, gas stations, grocery, restaurants, and e-commerce with geographic granularity down to city level. Features weekly spending trends, year-over-year growth rates, seasonal adjustments, and economic indicators. Trusted by central banks, government agencies, and institutional investors for macroeconomic analysis, retail sector research, and nowcasting economic conditions.

title: Visa Business & Consumer Transactions
description: Global payment network insights from Visa's $14+ trillion annual payment volume across 200+ countries and territories. Features aggregated transaction trends, merchant category analytics, cross-border payment flows, and consumer spending patterns. Includes real-time economic indicators, seasonal adjustment models, and geographic spending analysis. Essential for macroeconomic research, retail intelligence, central bank monitoring, and financial services strategy with unparalleled global payment ecosystem visibility.

title: Plaid Consumer Bank Transaction Aggregator
description: Comprehensive US consumer banking insights aggregated from 11,000+ financial institutions serving 200+ million consumer accounts. Features categorized transaction data, income verification analytics, cash flow patterns, and spending behavior insights. Includes real-time account balance trends, merchant categorization, and financial health indicators. Essential for fintech applications, lending decisioning, personal finance management, and consumer credit assessment with bank-grade security and privacy compliance.

title: Experian Global B2B Payments Data
description: Comprehensive B2B payment intelligence covering 200+ million businesses across 50+ countries with $15+ trillion in annual commercial transaction volume. Features trade credit analytics, payment behavior patterns, supplier-buyer relationship insights, and commercial payment timing analysis. Includes industry benchmarking, credit risk indicators, and supply chain financing analytics. Essential for commercial lending, supply chain finance, trade credit management, and B2B payment optimization with unmatched global commercial transaction visibility.

title: Thomson Reuters News Analytics
description: AI-powered financial sentiment analysis processing 7+ million news articles daily from 1,000+ global sources in 23 languages. Features real-time sentiment scores, relevance rankings, and novelty detection for 70,000+ financial instruments across equities, bonds, currencies, and commodities. Includes machine-readable news analytics, event detection algorithms, and predictive sentiment models. Essential for algorithmic trading, systematic investment strategies, risk management, and quantitative research with industry-leading NLP accuracy and comprehensive market coverage.

title: Accern Real-Time Financial News Sentiment
description: Advanced AI-powered sentiment analytics processing 1.5+ million financial news articles, SEC filings, social media posts, and earnings calls daily. Features proprietary NLP models trained on financial language, real-time sentiment scoring for 6,000+ US equities, and event-driven sentiment analysis. Includes momentum indicators, sentiment volatility metrics, and predictive sentiment models. Essential for quantitative trading strategies, alpha generation, market timing, and systematic investment processes with millisecond-latency sentiment signals.

title: StockTwits Social Sentiment Feed
description: Real-time retail investor sentiment intelligence from the largest financial social network with 5+ million active investors sharing 300,000+ daily messages. Features sentiment analysis, message volume tracking, bullish/bearish indicators, and trending stock discovery. Includes retail investor momentum signals, crowd sentiment analytics, and social influence metrics. Essential for understanding retail trading patterns, contrarian indicators, social sentiment-driven alpha, and retail investor behavior analysis with authentic grassroots market sentiment.

title: Bloomberg News & Social Sentiment Index
description: Premier global sentiment intelligence aggregating Bloomberg's proprietary news analytics, social media monitoring, and AI-powered sentiment scoring across 50,000+ financial instruments. Features composite sentiment indices, media buzz metrics, and narrative change detection from Bloomberg Terminal news, social platforms, and regulatory filings. Includes cross-asset sentiment correlations, sentiment momentum indicators, and institutional-grade sentiment models. Essential for systematic trading strategies, risk management, and quantitative research with Bloomberg's unmatched global news network and analytical depth.

title: MSCI ESG Ratings & Metrics
description: Industry-leading ESG research covering 10,000+ global companies with $70+ trillion in market capitalization. Features comprehensive ESG ratings (AAA to CCC scale), detailed scores across 35 key ESG issues, and real-time controversy monitoring with impact severity assessments. Includes carbon emissions data, climate risk metrics, governance quality indicators, and social impact measurements. Methodology follows institutional investor standards with transparent scoring and regular updates. Essential for sustainable investing, regulatory compliance (EU SFDR, SEC climate rules), risk management, and ESG integration across investment processes.

title: Sustainalytics Global ESG Risk Ratings
description: Comprehensive ESG risk intelligence covering 20,000+ public companies and 100,000+ corporate entities across 150+ countries. Features ESG Risk Ratings (0-100 scale), detailed issue-level analysis across 200+ ESG indicators, and material ESG risk assessments. Includes corporate governance evaluations, controversy monitoring, and sustainable finance taxonomy mapping. Essential for investment risk assessment, regulatory compliance (EU Taxonomy, SFDR), sustainable portfolio construction, and ESG integration with Morningstar's analytical rigor and global coverage.

title: RepRisk ESG Company Intelligence
description: Real-time ESG risk monitoring platform tracking 200,000+ public and private companies across 34 sectors through systematic analysis of 100,000+ media sources in 23 languages. Features daily-updated ESG risk ratings, business conduct assessments, and controversy alerts. Includes due diligence screening, supply chain risk mapping, and regulatory compliance monitoring. Essential for investment screening, operational risk management, regulatory reporting, and ESG controversy prevention with comprehensive global media surveillance and multilingual coverage.

title: Yewno | Edge AI ESG Scores
description: Next-generation AI-powered ESG analytics leveraging advanced natural language processing and machine learning to analyze 15,000+ global public companies. Features real-time ESG scoring, AI-driven controversy detection, and predictive ESG risk modeling. Includes semantic analysis of corporate disclosures, earnings calls, and regulatory filings. Essential for quantitative ESG investing, systematic sustainability strategies, and AI-enhanced ESG research with cutting-edge artificial intelligence and transparent methodology.

title: S&P Global Financial Entity Reference Data
description: Comprehensive global financial reference database covering 500,000+ legal entities and 15+ million financial instruments across 200+ countries. Features standardized LEI codes, ISIN mappings, CUSIP identifiers, and entity relationship hierarchies. Includes regulatory identifiers, corporate structures, and counterparty intelligence for banks, funds, and investment firms. Essential for regulatory reporting, risk management, transaction processing, and compliance operations with authoritative data quality and global coverage.

title: GLEIF Global LEI Reference Database
description: Official Global Legal Entity Identifier Foundation database containing 2.3+ million verified legal entities across 220+ jurisdictions worldwide. Features standardized LEI codes, entity hierarchies, ownership structures, and registration data. Includes regulatory validation, corporate relationship mapping, and entity lifecycle management. Essential for regulatory compliance (MiFID II, EMIR), counterparty identification, transaction reporting, and global entity data governance with authoritative legal status and regulatory mandate.

title: FactSet Financial Instrument Reference Master
description: Comprehensive financial instrument reference master covering 50+ million securities across global markets with universal identifier mapping and normalization. Features ISIN, CUSIP, SEDOL cross-references, corporate action adjustments, and instrument lifecycle management. Includes pricing identifiers, trading venue mappings, and regulatory classifications. Essential for portfolio management, trade processing, regulatory reporting, and risk systems with institutional-grade data quality and global coverage.

title: Bloomberg OpenFIGI Instrument Reference
description: Industry-standard Financial Instrument Global Identifier database covering 500+ million financial instruments globally with real-time identifier mapping and normalization. Features Bloomberg's proprietary FIGI standard, cross-reference mapping to legacy identifiers, and comprehensive security master data. Includes corporate action processing, identifier lifecycle management, and API-based lookups. Essential for trade processing, regulatory reporting, risk management, and financial data integration with industry-leading identifier coverage and real-time updates.

title: Dow Jones Risk & Compliance KYC/AML Data
description: Comprehensive global risk intelligence database covering 5+ million high-risk entities across 240+ countries and territories. Features sanctions screening, politically exposed persons (PEP) identification, adverse media monitoring, and ultimate beneficial ownership structures. Includes real-time regulatory enforcement actions, OFAC/EU/UN sanctions lists, and enhanced due diligence profiles. Essential for AML compliance, sanctions screening, KYC onboarding, and regulatory risk management with authoritative global coverage and daily updates.

title: Refinitiv World-Check Risk Intelligence
description: Industry-leading risk screening database covering 6+ million profiles of high-risk individuals and entities across 240+ countries. Features comprehensive PEP identification, sanctions screening, adverse media analysis, and regulatory enforcement tracking. Includes family and associate connections, entity ownership structures, and enhanced due diligence profiles. Essential for AML compliance, customer onboarding, third-party risk management, and regulatory screening with market-leading accuracy and global regulatory coverage.

title: LexisNexis Global Watchlist File
description: Comprehensive watchlist intelligence aggregating 600+ official government and regulatory lists with enhanced risk profiling for sanctions and AML compliance. Features consolidated screening of OFAC, EU, UN, and domestic watchlists, adverse media monitoring, and regulatory enforcement actions. Includes entity resolution, false positive reduction, and risk scoring algorithms. Essential for sanctions compliance, AML screening, third-party due diligence, and regulatory risk management with comprehensive global coverage and real-time updates.

title: Moody's Analytics Sanctions Check
description: Advanced sanctions and compliance screening platform covering 2,000+ sanctions lists and 15+ million risk entities globally. Features automated screening workflows, enhanced due diligence investigations, and regulatory compliance monitoring. Includes PEP identification, adverse media analysis, and ongoing monitoring capabilities. Essential for sanctions compliance, customer screening, transaction monitoring, and regulatory risk management with sophisticated analytics and comprehensive global coverage.

title: Moody's Analytics Global Economic Scenarios
description: Industry-leading macroeconomic stress testing platform providing 200+ regulatory-compliant scenarios for CCAR, DFAST, EBA, APRA, and IFRS 9 compliance. Features baseline, adverse, and severely adverse scenarios with 30+ years of historical calibration and forward-looking projections. Includes stochastic scenario generation, sectoral stress tests, and climate risk scenarios. Essential for regulatory capital planning, stress testing, economic capital modeling, and CECL provisioning with central bank-approved methodologies and global regulatory coverage.

title: S&P Global Market Risk Scenarios
description: Comprehensive market risk scenario platform delivering 500+ stress scenarios and shock calibrations for multi-asset portfolio risk management. Features historical and hypothetical stress tests, correlation breakdowns, and tail risk analysis across equities, fixed income, currencies, and commodities. Includes regulatory scenarios (Fed CCAR, EBA), climate stress tests, and custom scenario generation. Essential for market risk management, portfolio stress testing, regulatory compliance, and capital allocation with sophisticated modeling and comprehensive asset class coverage.

title: Bloomberg Stress Testing & Regulatory Models
description: Scenarios and shocks for multi-asset portfolios, following global and local regulatory stress standards.

title: Refinitiv Regulatory Stress Scenarios
description: Macroeconomic scenarios and financial stress indicators for regulatory reporting in major jurisdictions.

title: FICO Consumer Credit Scores
description: Detailed FICO credit score history, default prediction and score distribution for US consumers.

title: Experian Credit Risk & Default Models
description: Default probability, risk scores, and risk segmentations for consumers and creditors with Experian methodologies.

title: Moody's Analytics EDF Default Probability
description: Point-in-time/through-the-cycle credit risk and default probability for public firms and sovereigns globally.

title: S&P Global Credit Analytics & Risk Metrics
description: International credit risk analytics, score models, and default/stress probabilities for corporates and sovereigns.

title: Databricks Financial Intelligence Customer 360 Banking Analytics
description: Comprehensive retail/commercial customer behavior including product use, engagement, and churn prediction.

title: FICO Banking Customer Segmentation & Lifetime Value
description: Advanced customer analytics platform providing behavioral segmentation and lifetime value modeling for 200+ million retail banking customers across North America. Features predictive LTV algorithms, customer journey mapping, product propensity models, and churn prediction analytics. Includes channel optimization insights, cross-sell opportunity identification, and personalization algorithms. Essential for customer acquisition, retention strategies, marketing optimization, and revenue maximization with industry-leading predictive accuracy.

title: Experian Commercial Client Analytics
description: Comprehensive B2B customer intelligence covering 30+ million commercial entities with advanced behavioral and transactional analytics. Features business banking segmentation, commercial lending insights, cash flow analytics, and enterprise relationship mapping. Includes industry benchmarking, payment behavior analysis, and commercial growth indicators. Essential for commercial banking strategy, business lending decisions, treasury management, and corporate relationship optimization with extensive B2B market coverage.

title: Bloomberg Client Data & Transaction Analytics
description: Institutional-grade client analytics platform covering Bloomberg Terminal users and institutional trading activity across global financial markets. Features client segmentation, trading pattern analysis, product usage analytics, and relationship intelligence. Includes execution quality metrics, flow analysis, and institutional behavior insights. Essential for sales strategy, relationship management, product development, and institutional client optimization with comprehensive market participation data.

title: FICO Financial Fraud Detection Patterns
description: Advanced AI-powered fraud detection leveraging FICO's 30+ years of analytics expertise and protecting $3+ trillion in annual transaction volume. Features real-time fraud scoring algorithms, behavioral pattern recognition, and machine learning models trained on global fraud data. Includes device profiling, velocity checks, geolocation analytics, and consortium fraud intelligence from 9,000+ financial institutions. Provides explainable AI fraud scores, adaptive model updates, and comprehensive case management tools. Essential for real-time payment fraud prevention, account takeover detection, and regulatory compliance across digital banking and fintech platforms.

title: Experian FraudNet Transaction Patterns
description: Advanced fraud analytics network leveraging 15+ billion annual transactions to identify emerging fraud patterns and anomalies across payment channels. Features machine learning models for synthetic identity detection, account takeover prevention, and real-time transaction scoring. Includes consortium intelligence from 3,000+ financial institutions, behavioral biometrics, and device fingerprinting analytics. Essential for payment fraud prevention, identity verification, and regulatory compliance with comprehensive fraud pattern recognition and real-time decisioning capabilities.

title: Visa Transaction Risk Scoring Analytics
description: Real-time fraud detection analytics leveraging Visa's global payment network processing 190+ billion transactions annually across 200+ countries. Features advanced machine learning models for card-present and card-not-present fraud detection, merchant risk profiling, and cross-border transaction analysis. Includes velocity checks, spending pattern analysis, and geographic risk assessment. Essential for payment fraud prevention, merchant onboarding, and transaction authorization decisioning with sub-second fraud scoring and global payment network intelligence.

title: TransUnion TrueValidate Fraud Patterns
description: Advanced synthetic identity detection and fraud analytics leveraging TransUnion's comprehensive consumer and commercial credit data across North America. Features AI-powered identity verification, synthetic identity scoring, and payment fraud pattern recognition. Includes device intelligence, behavioral analytics, and consortium fraud data from financial services ecosystem. Essential for account origination, identity verification, synthetic fraud prevention, and regulatory compliance with comprehensive coverage of US and Canadian markets.
